sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on December 15, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 28, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -54.55% decrease from the prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $18.86, the dividend yield is 2.65%.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $18.86, representing a -40.32% decrease from the 52 week high of $31.60 and a 5.13% increase over the 52 week low of $17.94.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $.08.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as -31.57%, compared to an industry average of -1.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
